#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	int t;
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	ll n,ans,num,k,cnt,i,val;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		val=(k*(k+1))/2;
		if(val<n)
		cout<<-1<<endl;
		else if(val==n)
		cout<<0<<endl;
		else
		{
			if(n<=k)
			cout<<k-1<<endl;
			else
			{
				ans=sqrt(1+8*(val-n));
				ans=(ans-1)/2;
				cout<<ans<<endl;
			}
			
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
